nodes.text: Cularin at Night is an article written by Morrie Mullins as a tie in to the Living Force adventure Night's Friend. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on October 2, 2003 and took the form of a recorded voice-only conversation posted to the Cularin holonet by anonymous sources. It discussed the activities of the Thaereian Navy in rounding up citizens at night.
